page.title: 12Methods of transport
page.content: If we go a short way, like down the road, we{walk}.If we go a bit further we go on{bikes}but if we go quite a long way we go by{car}.People without cars can go to places on{buses}which run locally in all towns. The cars we have now vary very much in size. Most people have one but there are one or two problems with them.The{exhaust fumes pollute}the air and{petrol}is very{expensive}to buy . We use{diesel}and{electric trains}to get all over the place.Sometimes we go on{steamtrains}but just for fun. Nearly everybody uses{aeroplanes}when they want to go across the sea but some people would rather go by{boat}.
